article.headline: UTEP 87, W. New Mexico 58
article.story: EL PASO, Texas -- John Bohannon had 20 points and 14 rebounds and UTEP never trailed in a 87-58 rout of Western New Mexico Tuesday night. Gabriel McCulley had 14 points for the Miners (10-3), and Christian Polk and Claude Britten scored 11 points apiece. Jeremy Williams pulled down 13 rebounds. UTEP opened up a 16-4 lead, with Bohannon scoring seven points in the early going, on the way to a 41-26 halftime lead. T.J. Riley led Western New Mexico (3-8) with 15 points. Chuck Kempf had 13 points for the Mustangs (3-8), who play in Division II.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
